titles.title: Aircraft Maintenance Outsourcing Disclosure Act of 2018
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to require air carriers to disclose the date and location of the most recent aircraft maintenance.
Aircraft Maintenance Outsourcing Disclosure Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Aircraft Maintenance Outsourcing Disclosure Act of 2018
This bill requires the Federal Aviation Administration to require an air carrier providing scheduled passenger air transportation to: (1) disclose to the public the date and location of the most recent heavy maintenance for specific flights, and (2) provide a similar disclosure for its entire fleet.
